#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define maxi 1000005

int main()
{
	int t;
	char a[maxi];
	long long int l,lo,ans,i,o;
	scanf("%d\n",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		gets(a);
		l=lo=ans=i=o=0;
		while(i<strlen(a)&&a[i]!='L')
		i++;
		while(i<strlen(a)&&a[i]!='O')
		{
			if(a[i]=='L')
			l++;
			i++;
		}
		while(i<strlen(a)&&a[i]!='L')
		{
			if(a[i]=='O')
			o++;
			i++;
		}
		lo=l*o;
		while(i<strlen(a))
		{
			if(a[i]=='O')
			lo+=l;
			else if(a[i]=='L')
			{
				ans+=lo;
				l++;
			}
			i++;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
